data.event: According to INEGI 2010 national census it pegged the town's population at 1,060 people.

event.title: estimated the population to be at 1,278 in 2005

data.event: A special census done by the INEGI government agency estimated the population to be at 1,278 in 2005.

event.title: seems low, about 1,000 people from La Garita now

data.event: Although this number seems low, about 1,000 people from La Garita now reside in the United States with the most living in California, Illinois, Texas, Florida, and New York.

event.title: was founded approximately on the year 1846

data.event: The hacienda was founded approximately on the year 1846 (it is the date that is reference by the eldest citizens).
